name: Project-DamnitZach
tagline: Me d*cking around trying stuff with the 2013 edition of the Source SDK
body:
### Welcome to Project-DamnitZach
(Logo Coming Soon!)

This site is the product of my 10 minutes of work that I have spent on this so far. The idea of this project was to introduce myself to the Source SDK. The ending product with hopefully be a coop/pvp zombie game or some thing like that. I am using HL2 source code. 

### Cooperation
I for the most part don't want help with the base game as the purpose was for me to intro myself to the source SDK. However I am always wanting for extra tips on the Source SDK as I have not used it before. I am also always wanting for people who design models and want to give me one or two as I suck at design. Lastly I am always ready for new ideas and brainstormers to give me the ideas to match your image of the perfect game. (Zach, if you are reading this, goddamit).

### Authors and Contributors
Thanks to @JohnDrinkWater and the valve team for making the SDK available for people to use. Thanks to Zach(you know who you are) for my inspiration. Thanks to Andrew for bein' a lil B*tch. and thanks to the @NSA for watching me go through this. As well as all the people on the Source SDK wiki for leaving me all the help I could need

### Support or Contact
Want to help me out a bit? Want to get a big thanks from yours truly? Wanna get in on the beta that might not actually happen? Well you've come to the right place! Contact me at madc0wz.damnitzach@gmail.com ill try to reply within 72 hours.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
